00039 void Camera::move(float x, float y, float z)
00040 {
00041     float* currentMatrix = Position.getMatrix();
00042 
00043     //Assemble a new position matrix by incrementing the values on the old matrix
00044     float newPositionMatrix[3] =
00045     {
00046         currentMatrix[0] + x, currentMatrix[1] + y, currentMatrix[2] + z
00047     };
00048 
00049     Position.setMatrix(newPositionMatrix);
00050 }

00055     float rotationMatrix[3] =
00056     {
00057         x, y, z
00058     };
00059 
00060     Rotation.setMatrix(rotationMatrix);
00061 }
00062 
00063 void Camera::rotate(float x, float y, float z)
00064 {
00065 
00066     float* currentMatrix = Rotation.getMatrix();
00067 
00068     //Assemble a new position matrix by incrementing the values on the old matrix
00069     float newRotationMatrix[3] =
00070     {
00071         currentMatrix[0] + x, currentMatrix[1] + y, currentMatrix[2] + z
00072     };
00073 
00074     Rotation.setMatrix(newRotationMatrix);
00075 
00076 }

00078 void Camera::renderMoveTo()
00079 {
00080     float* positionMatrix = Position.getMatrix();
00081     float* rotationMatrix = Rotation.getMatrix();
00082 
00083     GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->rotateMatrix( rotationMatrix[0], rotationMatrix[1], rotationMatrix[2] );
00084     GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->translateMatrix( positionMatrix[0] , positionMatrix[1] , positionMatrix[2] );
00085 }
